page.title: 14ANIMAL & GRASSLAND RESEARCH
page.content: Part of the Animal and Grassland Research Institute is situated at Hall Farm Arborfield.It is used for research into cattle food and milk production.In order to ensure that each cow receives a cotrolled amount of food each cow has its own feeding box.Each box has a door which can only be opened by a magnetic key.Every cow has its own key round its neck, which can only open one door. One of the most important developments which has taken place at AGRIis the production of clean milk i.e. milk which is free from tubercolosis and bruscellosis.The Institute is also experimenting into the production of methane from the cows' waste product.The methane would be liquified and used to power such things as cars and various items of machinery.
